敃敃敃
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

Related Character(s): 又, 民, 拇, 攴, 愍
Связанный персонаж (и): снова, люди, большой палец, печаль, оглушение

敃字的基本解释

敃
mǐn
强横；顽悍。
勉力；勉强。

敃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mǐn］
［《廣韻》眉殞切，上軫，明。］
同“暋1”。
(1)强横。
(2)勉力；强勉。
[②]［fēn］
［《集韻》敷文切，平文，敷。］
纷乱貌。后作“紛”。

敃字的康熙字典解释

【卯集下】【攴字部】　敃； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页469第23
【廣韻】眉殞切【集韻】【韻會】美殞切，?音愍。疆也。　又【集韻】眉貧切，音珉。【玉篇】勉也，同暋。　又敷文切，音紛。亂也。通作紛。【說文】从攴作敃。敃字原从攴作。

敃字的源字形

字源演变：

金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
敃字的起名意思

暂无。

暋
Basic explanation of words
暋
mǐn
Tyrannical; stubborn.
Reluctantly
暋
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mǐn］
["Guang Yun" eyebrows are cut, Shang Zhen, Ming. ]
Same as "暋1".
(1) Domineering.
(2) Reluctant; reluctant.
[②]［fēn］
["Jiyun" apply text cut, plain text, apply. ]
Chaotic appearance. Later as "Fun".
暋
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 2] [Department of Characters] 　暋; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 469 23
[Guang Yun] Eyebrow dying [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Mei dying,? Yin stunned. Xinjiang also.　[Jiyun] The eyebrows are poor and cut, and the sound is min. [Jade articles] Mian Ye, Tong Jun.　The text is cut again, and the sound is divergent. Chaos too. All are different. [Said the text] from the 攴作暋. The word "Zi" was originally made from "Zi".
